page.title: 10SAINT PETERSTIDE
page.content: Saint Peter is the patron saint of fishermen and Porthleven is a fishing village so one of the notable events in Porthleven is Saint Peterstide which takes place on the Saturday nearest to the 29th June. People from the village churches gather at one of the churches. Then led by a band they march around the village. They finish at the football field where the Sunday School teachers give out saffron buns and there are races and games. Prizes for the little ones are toys and the older ones get money. Across the road from the football field is a car park where the fair is. Anybody can join in the walk around the village whether they go to church or not.
